title: Reliance sees greener pastures in renewable energy, eyes global partnerships
description: Reliance Industries Ltd announced its ambition to collaborate with global climate technology leaders and focus on renewable energy projects in fiscal 2024. The company began developing new-energy manufacturing facilities and secured BIS certification for its solar panels. RIL also started RE projects in Gujarat and established a lithium-ion cell manufacturing pilot line.
